name: CyberCube for Merge Cube
description:
Hack the cyberzone!

The glitch is coming. You’re the only one who can stop it. Hack into the cyberzone using your standard issue augmented reality CyberCube. Match the patterns on the CyberCube with the sequence presented on your HUD. But do it quickly! When the glitch fills your display completely the mission is lost.

Features:

• Requires Merge Cube
• Unique AR Experience
• Mobile Mode and Merge Mode*

(*Merge Mode Available with Merge VR Goggles)

Only for Merge Cube.
